properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORTCOUNT, M.SIGNIN_DATE AS SIGNIN_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS BOARDCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) >= 1 ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC) B

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORTCOUNT , M.SIGNIN_DATE AS SIGNIN_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS BOARDCOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) >= 1 ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
